about_the_game:
Slay your way to victory!


Dodge, slash, block, and parry your way to freedom! Defeat over 11 monstrous beasts to uncover the dark truth that lurks in the depths of the Sadist King's castle. Featuring retro graphics heavily inspired by the Atari 2600:

Trapped in the keep of the Sadist King, a fate worse than death.


You play the role of a lone soul on a quest to save the Princess of Whitebridge, captured by the Sadist King. The King has agreed to let you live if you can conquer the towering beasts that occupy his castle’s hold, but nothing will satisfy his insatiable appetite for the stench of blood.

Don the armor of the illustrious Big Heavy, once known as the savior of Woodsvale and eradicator of the withering plague. Claim your freedom and return to Whitebridge a hero.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: Big Heavy is a demanding 2D souls-like boss rush. Roll, block, hack, and slash your way to freedom from the clutches of the Sadist King. Only 11 colossal brutes stand in your way. Will you escape with your life or become another victim of the arena?
